https://tmrev.io/movie/22786-Different from Whom? 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pmQAAuqoS5Ywk3XhDRvprcLc0GJ.jpg Political strategists in a northern Italian city push gay-rights campaigner Piero into the mayoral race, pairing him with uptight conservative toughie Adele (Claudia Gerini). Piero and his partner, Remo, are the stable ones, while buttoned-up divorcee Adele nurses her bitterness. Different from Whom?
